meaningMnemonic: You know 日本 means "Japan." So, now you have the kanji for <kanji>all</kanji> added to it, making this word <vocabulary>All Japan</vocabulary> (as in "All Japan Railways" or something like that).
readingMnemonic: You know the reading of 日本. Now just add the on'yomi reading of 全 and you should be able to read this word.
